          <title>
            <string language="et">Koduloomade pojad</string>
            <string language="en">Domestic animals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haustiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animaux domestiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animais domésticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animali domestici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατοικίδια ζώα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animales domésticos</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Programmiga Kidspiration loodud tööleht, kus on vaja üles leida koduloomade pojad ja öelda, mis häält nad teevad.</string>
            <string language="en">A worksheet made with programme Kidspiration where students have to find the young ones of animals and tell which sounds they make.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Loomad</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Bogen gebildet mit Programm Kidspiration, in 
dem Kursteilnehmer die jungen der Tiere finden und erklären müssen, 
welche Töne sie bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un tableau fait avec le programme Kidspiration où
les étudiants doivent trouver les jeunes d'animaux et dire quels 
bruits ils font.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma folha feita com programa Kidspiration onde os 
estudantes têm que encontrar novos dos animais e dizer que sons 
fazem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un foglio di lavoro fatto con il programma 
Kidspiration dove gli allievi devono trovare quei giovani degli 
animali e dire al quali suoni fanno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα φύλλο εργασίας έκανε με το πρόγραμμα 
Kidspiration όπου οι σπουδαστές πρέπει να βρούν το νέο αυτό 
των ζώων και να πουν ποιους ήχους κάνουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una hoja de trabajo hecha con el programa 
Kidspiration donde los estudiantes tienen que encontrar los jóvenes 
de animales y decir qué sonidos hacen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natur</string>
